name: Sachie Momochi
description: Sachie has orange hair and wears a shuriken behind her ear. She is only seen wearing her Satoyama Junior High uniform which is blue and white and wears a pair of red and white running shoes. She has a distinct birthmark on her left butt cheek that many of her fellow students call aPoopmark but to aliens it resembles the symbol of theGalactic Patrol.

name: Yamcha/Dragonball Evolution
description: AsGoku,Master Roshi, andBulmacontinue their journey for the sevenDragon Balls, they fall into an incredibly deep ditch. Straight after, Yamcha arrives, pretending to be a passer-by and offering help. Soon after though, Yamcha is revealed to be a bandit, who had dug the huge ditch to begin with. After some persuasion from Bulma that he'll get a reward, Yamcha joins the gang. He assists them in fighting againstLord Piccolo'sFu-Lum. After Piccolo manages to retrieve all the Dragon Balls with the...

name: Youth (Dragon Ball Online)
description: As a custom character, the Youth's appearance is entirely dictated by the player, whose race can beSaiyan-Earthlinghybrid,Namekian, orMajinwith the first one having male and female version. The skin and hair color can also be customized. The only thing consistent with the Youth's appearance is that it starts the adventure as a child, and then grows up after finishing quest forKorin.

name: Gohan
description: Son Gohan(孫悟飯,Son Gohan)is a half-breedSaiyanand one of the most prominent characters in theDragon Ballseries. He is the elder son of the series' primary protagonistGokuand his wifeChi-Chi, the older brother ofGoten, the husband ofVideland father toPan. He is named after Goku's adoptive grandfather,Gohan.

name: Manpuku Okawari
description: Manpuku Okawari piloted theTwinkle 8on a mission to space withTightsjoining who was a body double forAn Azukiin case of any accidents. The shuttle malfunctioned while flying and was going to crash intoEast Citybut Manpuku was saved along with Tights byJacowith the help ofTokunoshin Omori's faultyTime Machinewhich stopped time briefly. Manpuku rode inJaco's Spaceshipwhile Jaco kicked the Twinkle 8 off course to fall into the ocean and Manpuku got out safely in East City.

name: Coco
description: Coco was selected byMaloja, the village priest, to be the annual human sacrifice to the "monster" attacking the village. The human sacrifice is said to appease the angry spirits and leave the village in peace. Later,Goten,Trunks, andVidelfind out about this and defeat the monster, adinosaur.

description: Once Mechikabura was revived, and the Dark Demon Realm army became the Dark Empire, many soldiers of different types were enlisted to serve the commanding Demon Gods of the army, so they could invade different times and locations in order to obtain theDark Dragon Balls.

name: Mugley
description: Mugley is a scrawny, underweight boy with a dark brown bowl haircut and a pair of green thick-rimmed glasses. He wears a very loose-fitting red wrestling leotard, a pair of blue wristbands, and a pair of red wrestling boots.

name: Oatmeel
description: Not much is known about Oatmeel, but he is capable at providingGranolahwith information. He also seems to be more level-headed and reads situations better than Granolah, especially when it comes to theSaiyans, as while Granolah was hellbent on exacting vengeance for his people, Oatmeel listened to what bothGokuandVegetahad to say and came to the correct conclusion that they were not acting onFrieza's behalf nor liked the tyrant in the slightest.

name: Taro
description: Like allUniverse 7Saiyans, Taro possesses atailand also wears clothing of Saiyans who worked under theFrieza Force. He also possesses a mustache and has a well-built physique. Like most Saiyans, Taro possesses jet black hair, and his hair is short and flat at the top. He is also light in skin complexion and appears to be medium in height.

name: Old Scientist
description: At some point during his researches, he decided to travel to the volcanicMount Kiwi, the home of the Fire-Eater, but all that he could find there was the lasteggof this seemingly extinct bird species. He then decided to stay in the island and took care of the egg for many years, hoping that it would hatch some day.

name: Bon Para
description: Bon Para is one of the threePara Brothers, along with Don and Son Para, and often speaks on behalf of the trio. AfterGoku,PanandTrunksseemingly secure theBlack Star Dragon Ballon planetGelbo, Bon Para appears disguised as aGelboianand steals the artifact fromPan's hands by using histelekinesis. In their haste to track down the thieves, theSaiyansfind themselves tricked into touching down on adangerous asteroid.

name: Ipana
description: Ipana finds the unconsciousBardockon his planet after theSaiyan's failed attempt to defeatFriezaand stop the destruction ofPlanet Vegeta. He brings Bardock to his house and heals him. Bardock leaves Ipana's house when Toobi and Kyabira, two soldiers of theFrieza Force, arrive and threaten to conquer Planet Plant. After Bardock kills the two soldiers, he flies away to hang out in a cave. To thank him, Ipana asks his son, Berry, to bring Bardock baskets of food.

He charges a hefty price for his expert services, as he normally charges ten billionZeniper kill (one hundred million in the Japanese version) but gaveCommander Reda 20th anniversary discount of five billion Zeni (fifty million in the Japanese version).

name: Dark Vassals
description: TheDark Vassalsare "Demon Clan"(魔族,Mazoku)Namekianspawns. They aredemonNamekiansbirthed byKing Piccoloand later theDark Namekians. They are mutants touched by evil.These creatures are actually the first Namekians to appear,making their first appearance in the chapter "The Death of Kuririn" and the episode "Enter King Piccolo". All of the named Mutated Namekians have names based on musical instruments, just like Piccolo.

name: Good Supreme Demon King
description: Much like one of his successorsAbura, the Good Supreme Demon King has a pretty portly appearance. However, unlike Abura andDabura, his skin tone appears to be more purple and his horns upon his head are much more pronounced. He also has atailand wields a sword.
